subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Matt Holliday’s drop of a line drive with two outs in the ninth inning led to the Dodgers’ Game 2 win on Mark Loretta’s pinch-hit single.
snippet: Matt Holliday’s drop of a line drive with two outs in the ninth inning led to the Dodgers’ Game 2 win on Mark Loretta’s pinch-hit single.
